docs.snippet: The shortstop Stephen Drew tested the open market and found it lacking....
docs.lead_paragraph: The shortstop Stephen Drew tested the open market and found it lacking.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column examines shortstop Stephen Drew's return to the Boston Red Sox following a prolonged free agency; argues that negotiations were a fascinating case study in the value of solid, if unspectacular veterans tied to compensation.

headline.main: By Rejoining Red Sox, Drew Completes Detour Into Free Agency
headline.print_headline: By Rejoining Red Sox, Drew Completes Detour Into Free Agency
